Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute near 26th/Lawndale
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses temp. rerouted Southbound: Central Park, 31st and Lawndale; Northbound: Central Park and 25th: due to street blockage near 26th/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 26th/Lawndale, due to street blockage near 26th/Lawndale.

Southbound buses will operate via Central Park, 31st, Lawndale and over regular route.

Northbound buses will operate via Central Park, 25th and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #26 South Shore Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Ewing/Machinaw
ShortDescription: Northbound 26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ewing, 95th, South Chicago, Harbor Ave and Mackinaw: due to, near Ewing/Mackinaw.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

 

Northbound #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ewing, 95th, South Chicago, Harbor Ave, Mackinaw and over regular route, due to street blockage near Ewing/Mackinaw.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Service Experiencing Significant Delays Due to Raised Bridge
ShortDescription: Brown Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

Some trains may be either held or rerouted before reaching the bridge in order to maintain service across the remainder of the route. Listen for announcements and check train destination signs when boarding.

We apologize for this temporary inconvenience and appreciate your patience while the Chicago Department of Transportation works to complete the bridge operation. Allow extra travel time.
